author: StarKiller22515
title: Avengers...Assemble.
review: This is a great and easy way to get Captain America's shield. The prints on Cap are from The First Avenger. The prints are pretty good, its just that the ears on these BrickHeadz will always look slightly unsettling. His head is kind of bland with not much detail, but his torso makes up for that. I would highly recommend getting this for someone if they are a fan of Marvel.
